The monitors set up next to the kiosks display flight departure and arrival times to ensure that you’re (2)……… on time.

At the Grand Hotel, you will feel right at home the moment you set foot in our hotel. Our warm and friendly staff will go out of their way to make you feel right at home. Relax and unwind from the stresses of (3)……… in one of our recently renovated guest rooms, complete with a Jacuzzi in each room.

So the next time you’re in Dallas, experience who comfortable and convenient travel can be. When you check into the Grand Hotel, you don’t just stay, you belong.
